effect.sun-moon: Inflicts regular damage. If a friendly Pokémon used water pledge earlier this turn, moves used by any friendly Pokémon have doubled effect chance for four turns (including this one).
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Inflicts regular damage. If a friendly Pokémon used water pledge earlier this turn, moves used by any friendly Pokémon have doubled effect chance for four turns (including this one).
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Inflicts regular damage. If a friendly Pokémon used water pledge earlier this turn, moves used by any friendly Pokémon have doubled effect chance for four turns (including this one).

short_effect.sun-moon: With Water Pledge, doubles the effect chance of friendly Pokémon’s moves for four turns.
short_effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: With Water Pledge, doubles the effect chance of friendly Pokémon’s moves for four turns.
short_effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: With Water Pledge, doubles the effect chance of friendly Pokémon’s moves for four turns.

flavor_text.sun-moon: A column of fire hits the target. When used with its grass equivalent, its power increases and a vast sea of fire appears.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: A column of fire hits the target. When used with its grass equivalent, its power increases and a vast sea of fire appears.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: A column of fire hits the target. When used with its grass equivalent, its power increases and a vast sea of fire appears.
